anatomicalAxesOrientation._instruction: Add the axes orientation denoted in standard anatomical terms of direction (stated as XYZ) for this common coordinate space.
anatomicalAxesOrientation.description: Relation between reference planes used in anatomy and mathematics.
anatomicalAxesOrientation.title: anatomicalAxesOrientation

axesOrigin._instruction: Enter the origin of this common coordinate space (central point where axes intersect; 2D: [x, y] or 3D:[x, y, z]).
axesOrigin.description: Special point in a coordinate system used as a fixed point of reference for the geometry of the surrounding space.
axesOrigin.title: axesOrigin

defaultImage._instruction: Add one or several image files used as visual representation of this common coordinate space.
defaultImage.description: Two or three dimensional image that particluarly represents a specific coordinate space.
defaultImage.title: defaultImage

digitalIdentifier._instruction: Add the globally unique and persistent digital identifier of this common coordinate space.
digitalIdentifier.description: Digital handle to identify objects or legal persons.
digitalIdentifier.title: digitalIdentifier

fullName._instruction: Enter a descriptive full name for this common coordinate space.
fullName.description: Whole, non-abbreviated name of something or somebody.
fullName.title: fullName

homepage._instruction: Add the uniform resource locator (URL) to the homepage of this common coordinate space.
homepage.description: Main website of something or someone.
homepage.title: homepage

howToCite._instruction: Enter the preferred citation text for this common coordinate space. Leave blank if citation text can be extracted from the assigned digital identifier.
howToCite.description: Preferred format for citing a particular object or legal person.
howToCite.title: howToCite

nativeUnit._instruction: Add the native unit that is used for this common coordinate space.
nativeUnit.description: Determinate quantity used in the original measurement.
nativeUnit.title: nativeUnit

ontologyIdentifier._instruction: Enter the identifier (IRI) of the related ontological term matching this common coordinate space.
ontologyIdentifier.description: Term or code used to identify something or someone registered within a particular ontology.
ontologyIdentifier.title: ontologyIdentifier

releaseDate._instruction: Enter the date of first publication of this common coordinate space.
releaseDate.description: Fixed date on which a product is due to become or was made available for the general public to see or buy
releaseDate.title: releaseDate

shortName._instruction: Enter a descriptive short name for this common coordinate space.
shortName.description: Shortened or fully abbreviated name of something or somebody.
shortName.title: shortName

versionIdentifier._instruction: Enter the version identifier of this common coordinate space.
versionIdentifier.description: Term or code used to identify the version of something.
versionIdentifier.title: versionIdentifier
